alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 12 at 2:21AM MDT until October 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM MDT /4 PM CDT/ THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON MDT /1 PM CDT/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts around 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In Colorado, Yuma, Kit Carson and Cheyenne Counties. In Nebraska, Dundy, Hitchcock and Red Willow Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM MDT /4 PM CDT/ this afternoon to noon MDT /1 PM CDT/ Friday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Reductions in visibility associated with blowing dust are possible especially Thursday afternoon into the evening.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
